casebody.data:
DTH MEDIA CORPORATION, et al.
v.
FOLT, et al. 142PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2019 Hugh Stevens, Attorney at Law, Michael J. Tadych, Attorney at Law, for DTH Media Corporation, et al. Stephanie A. Brennan, Special Deputy Attorney General, Matt Burke, Solicitor General Fellow, for Folt, Carol L., et al. Troy D. Shelton, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Victim Rights Organizations. Jonathan D. Jones, Attorney at Law, for Student Press Law Center, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th of January 2019 by Student Press Law Center and Brechner Center for Freedom of Information for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
